NEW HERE?
Coming to visit?
We know visiting a church for the first time can be intimidating, and we want to make your visit at Freedom Church a great one!
If you would like to get in touch with someone, please fill out the contact form below.
WHAT SHOULD I WEAR?
We want church to be a place you feel comfortable so you won't find a dress code here. You'll see most people wearing jeans and t-shirts, but pollos and button ups are common too.
WHAT IS A TYPICAL SERVICE LIKE?
Typically around 10:30 AM, our service begins with some worship. After that we have prayer and announcements. We then have a small break where kids 12 and under are released to children's church. Everyone grabs donuts and coffee before coming back for the sermon. You'll see the teens all like to sit together in our front two rows! After the sermon, we close with prayer and then all get more donuts and coffee before heading home.
WHAT DO YOU HAVE FOR MY KIDS?
For kids ages 5 - 12, we have a childrens church! For kids younger than that, you'll find a nursery with plenty of toys, a tv, and speakers to listen to the main sermon.
WHERE DO I GO WHEN I ARRIVE?
The elevator leads up to the main lobby where we keep our donuts and coffee
DO I NEED TO BE A MEMBER?
No, all are welcome to come and have fun. The only requirement is that you eat as many donuts as you want!
Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.
